channel.title: Tidytext on Brandon Sepulvado
channel.description: Recent content in Tidytext on Brandon Sepulvado

item.title: Keywords in bioethics publications: part one
item.description: In my first post, I am going to begin what will most likely be a three-part series on the evolution of bioethics publications over the last several decade. This post is mostly about getting the data in order and exploring what the amazing tidytext package has to offer. Bioethics has emerged over the last several decades from several branches of ethics (e.g., medical and religious) to form a domain with its own set of conceptual and institutional structures.
